    • abilityMarble

      public void abilityMarble​(java.util.Map<Marble,​java.lang.Integer> temporaryMapMarble, int numOfTransformation) throws NotEnoughWhiteMarblesException
      this method transform a number of white marbles from a map of marbles
      Overrides:
      abilityMarble in class LeaderCard
      Parameters:
      temporaryMapMarble - represents the map of marbles that contains the white marbles to transform
      numOfTransformation - is the number of marbles that needs to be transformed
      Throws:
      NotEnoughWhiteMarblesException - this exception is thrown when there are not enough white marbles in the given map of marbles
